instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
This is my first time working on this model board.
I have all the S5 rails but S4 is another story.

PM_SLP_S4_L = 0
PP3V3_S4 = 0.34

U5750 = PP3V42_G3H is present, Nothing else is but SMC_RST_TPAD_L


U7970
PM_SLP_S5_L = 0
SMC_S4_WAKESRC_EN = 0
Pin 6 power is present.
(no PP3V3_S4 enable)


At this point I am not sure if I am dealing with a SMC or a PCH issue.
Door #1 PM_SLP_S5_L missing
Door #2 SMC_S4_WAKESRC_EN

Probably because it's S5 Door #1
U1800 = PPVRTC_G3H =3.42v

No signs of liquid damage.

*Installing R7803 to bypass the missing PP3V3_S4 enable gets me nowhere.  The board still does not power up.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
Do you get both 3V3_S5/SUS?
Did you try original 85W charger?
Is PM_RSMRST_L high?
If yes, check if PM_PWRBTN_L reacts (drop pulse) when trigger SMC_ONOFF_L.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
85W YES
PP3V3_SUS 0v
PP3V3_SUS_EN_L 3.3v (PM_RSMRST_L)
PM_PWRBTN_L triggers low then high

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
"PP3V3_SUS_EN_L 3.3v"
Should be 0V (P3V3SUS_EN_L); remember what "_L" means.
Post SMC_BATLOW_L and PM_SLP_SUS_L.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
Check the charger power reported by other macine.
Usually low PM_BATLOW_L is caused by unproper charger.
Check if battery is charging at least.
If yes, give it some time to charge and try to start with charger and battery connected.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
I am testing this board out of frame using a 85w charger
I have no machine to put it in.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
Don't you have any compatible battery?
No need to put the board in case...

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message: I do not have a frame for this board at all.  Was given to me in a eBay purchase as a bonus.  I have been spending the day going through boards I need to fix or put in donor pile.

threads.title: 820-3332-A  (SMC_LRESET_L) 0.023V  (green light on charger)
threads.message:
Reflow/reaball/change SMC; if charger is OK for sure.
SMC should send out correct SMC_BATLOW_L.
BTW, R5040 is good?
